thread.title: Chris Rock confirmed to host the Oscars
thread.title_full: Chris Rock confirmed to host the Oscars

author: Tribune wire reports
title: Chris Rock confirmed to host the Oscars
text:
Chris Rock confirmed to host the Oscars Chris Rock 
Chris Rock in "2 Days in New York." 
Chris Rock in "2 Days in New York." (Magnolia Pictures) Tribune wire reports Contact Reporter 
Chris Rock has been confirmed as host of the 88th Academy Awards, producers David Hill and Reginald Hudlin announced Wednesday. 
Variety reported Tuesday that the comedian was in serious talks to return for his second stint as Oscar host. He previously hosted the awards show in 2005. 
“I’m so glad to be hosting the Oscars,” said Rock in a statement. “It’s great to be back.” 
Variety
